channel.title: Posts on Thomas McKeon
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Thomas McKeon

item.title: Home Plate Umpire Bias in the MLB
item.description: Investigation into the true strike-zone of MLB home plate umpires, and the consistent biases prevalent in their strike calling.

item.title: Performance Impact of Wage Inequality
item.description: Measuring the impact of wage inequality within between players in soccer clubs on the team’s domestic league performance.

item.title: Soccer Analytics Visualzations
item.description: Some of my more work-intensive soccer analytics visualizations.

item.title: Soccer Analytics Web Scrapers
item.description: Web Scrapers I’ve set up to collect Soccer data for projects and visualizations.

item.title: Welcome to my Project Portfolio
item.description: A small site holding the personal projects I’ve done in my spare time. Most revolve around my interest in Soccer and Baseball Analytics.
